welcome_message:
Hello {mention}! 👋 We're thrilled to have you join our community. Here are some resources to get you started:

📚 Read the rules in <#{rules_channel_id}>
📢 Check out our announcements in <#{announcements_channel_id}>
🤝 Introduce yourself in <#{introductions_channel_id}>

Enjoy your stay and feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
level_up_message: Congratulations {mention}, you've reached level {level}! Keep up the great work!
